subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: Zab Judah (41-6) knocked out Kaizer Mabuza in the seventh round in Newark to regain the International Boxing Federation junior welterweight title that he first held more than a decade ago.
snippet: Zab Judah (41-6) knocked out Kaizer Mabuza in the seventh round in Newark to regain the International Boxing Federation junior welterweight title that he first held more than a decade ago.
